name: Katharsis (itch) (ArturoCalle)
description:
Katharsis is a game prototype to be developed into a bigger game, made to explain and explore the sympthoms of depression, talk about how does it feels and how others can learn to provide emotional support to people with depression, through a narrative adventure and fictional story.  All from the point of view from a person who's not depressed. 

Currently only available in spanish
